00018 #ifndef GPIXEL_H
00019 #define GPIXEL_H
00020 
00021 
00026 class GPixel {
00027 public:
00028 
00029   int    id;    // first camera's ID
00030   double x;     // (x,y) of pixel in first view
00031   double y;
00032 
00033   bool operator ==(const GPixel &) const;
00034   bool operator !=(const GPixel &) const;
00035   bool operator <(const GPixel &) const;
00036   
00037 };
00038 
00039 
00044 inline bool GPixel::operator ==(const GPixel &o) const {
00045   return(id == o.id && fabs(x-o.x) < 1e-5 && fabs(y - o.y) < 1e-5);
00046 }
00047 
00048 
00051 inline bool GPixel::operator !=(const GPixel &o) const {
00052  return(!operator ==(o));
00053 }
00054 
00055 
00058 inline bool GPixel::operator <(const GPixel &o) const {
00059   if(id < o.id) return(true);
00060   if(id > o.id) return(false);
00061   if(x < o.x) return(true);
00062   if(x > o.x) return(false);
00063   if(y < o.y) return(true);
00064   return(false);
00065 }
00066 
00067 
00070 inline std::ostream &operator <<(std::ostream &out, const GPixel &c) {
00071   out << "(" << c.id << " " 
00072       << c.x << " "
00073       << c.y << ")";
00074   return(out);
00075 }
00076 
00077 #endif
